p: Two different aberration detection algorithms were compared: Holtâ€“Winters generalized exponential smoothing (HW) ( 19, 20) and Exponential Weighted Moving Average (EWMA) ( 21, 22). Ten different detection limits, or alarm thresholds, were tested for both algorithms. To avoid contamination of the baseline with cases from gradually increasing epidemics, a guard-band of 2 weeks was used between the baseline and the current value being evaluated.
